uiDefinition.description: The name of your storage account
uiDefinition.tooltip: Provide the name of the storage account used for tables as it appears in the Azure portal

uiDefinition.description: The shared storage key of your storage account
uiDefinition.tooltip: Provide a shared storage key for the storage account used for tables as it appears in the Azure portal

generalInformation.description: Azure Table storage is a service that stores structured NoSQL data in the cloud, providing a key/attribute store with a schemaless design. Sign into your Storage account to create, update, and query tables and more.
